item.title: Wildlife officials want help spotting rare Rainbow Snake in South Florida

item.title: Manatee County residents gettnig new trash bins
item.description: Manatee County residents gettnig new trash bins

item.title: Sarasota Police train for high-risk scenarios
item.description: Sarasota Police train for high-risk scenarios

item.title: Former Polk County Deputy cleared of on-duty DUI after charge dismissed
item.description: In May, the DUI charge was not prosecuted further and effectively dismissed.

item.title: Manatee County Commission delays discussion to restore wetlands buffer rules
item.description: George Kruse moved to cancel Thursday’s meeting because of pushback he has seen toward other county commissions.

item.title: Medical marijuana use should be no barrier to gun ownership, appeals court rules
item.description: The ruling sends the case back to a Florida court for further consideration.

item.title: DeSantis announces new grants to boost Florida’s rural communities and agriculture
item.description: The topic or purpose of the conference has not been released

item.title: New details learned in 2023 check fraud case involving former Sarasota postal worker
item.description: Over 30 people were victimized, and more than $60,000 was stolen.

item.title: No threat found after reports of shots fired on University of Tennessee at Chattanooga campus
item.description: The University of Tennessee - Chattanooga is on lockdown as police investigate a possible active shooter situation on campus.

item.title: Registered sex offender allegedly found in girl’s room in Port Charlotte home
item.description: He was allegedly found half-dressed in a girl’s bedroom, Charlotte County deputies said.

item.title: 11 AM Erin update
item.description: 5 AM UPDATE FROM THE NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER

item.title: Weapons detection systems now in all Manatee County Middle Schools
item.description: The Evolv weapons detection technology is designed to move students through security checkpoints faster.
